channel.title: Work in Progress on Bailey Atwood
channel.description: Recent content in Work in Progress on Bailey Atwood

item.title: Transfusion
item.description: Transfusion is a VR hack-and-slash made in Unreal Engine. In the game, you fight through waves of enemies using various element-based weapons inspired by Roman and Aztec culture. Currently, the project is still in development but is planned to be completed by early 2025. Responsibilities Modelled and textured key assets, including core player weapons Composed music to play during combat, utilizing musical language to convey tone and meaning Programmed a Quartz music system that allowed tracks to loop seamlessly without repeating intro segments
